amendment.description: Amendment repeals the exclusive rulemaking authority of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 113-350 to repeal the exclusive rulemaking authority of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeSantis amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 227 - 186 (Roll no. 82).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DeSantis amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 227 - 186 (Roll no. 82).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. DeSantis.
